name: Flashcards
description: Quizlet clone application built with T3Stack. CRUD functionalities for flashcards and folders. Available four learn modes using flashcards, user informations and settings. You can sign up using Google and Facebook authentication or credentials.

name: Blog
description: Blog about front-end development. Content built on Strapi CMS, user can read featured and recent articles, search content or filter by category, switch theme, navigate through article using table of content, contact author using form.

name: Cryptocurrencies
description: CoinMarketCap clone application built with CoinGecko API. Search your favourite crypto and analize it using financial chart. Create account and add it to your watchlist, manage your profile, post or comment on community feed.

name: To Do
description: Simple To Do application with theme switch, drag and drop, tests and database connection.
